markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Warden's Boon](/Feats.aspx?ID=518) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 174 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant the benefits listed in Hunt Prey and your hunter’s edge benefit to an ally until the end of their next turn. Depending on whether you call out or use gestures, this action gains either the auditory or visual trait.

<title level="2">Warden's Boon leads to...</title>
[Shared Prey](/Feats.aspx?ID=531)
name: Warden's Boon

<summary>
By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant an ally benefits from your hunting abilities.
</summary>
summary: By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant an ally benefits from your hunting abilities.
